Enhance market research skill with quote dating, CSV export, verification, and new categories

voice-of-customer data to a structured CSV \(Quote,Date,Type,URL,Source,Author,Category\),
add three new quote categories \(Objections, Triggers, Comparisons\), capture author/username
for each quote, and require source verification before saving any quote.

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add version check system with self-contained skills and CI enforcement

Each skill now carries version and repository fields in its SKILL.md frontmatter
so it can check for updates even when distributed as a standalone zip. Version
check fetches from raw GitHub URLs \(no gh CLI dependency\), caches results for
24 hours, and lets users skip if outdated.

Added GitHub Actions workflow with two jobs: one ensures all version-check.md
copies stay identical across skills, the other ensures SKILL.md versions match
plugin.json. Added CHANGELOG.md for surfacing what''s new to outdated users.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
